name: Folders for MaxGalleria
author: Christian Frick

sections.description:
This plugin combines the functionality of the two great plugins “MaxGalleria” and “Media Library Plus”. Once it is activated, it either manually or automatically moves the attachments like images and videos of each gallery to its gallery specific folder.

The folders and its names are automatically generated and can optionally be adapted. The plugin comes with a clear set of settings.

Note:
MaxGalleria and Media Library Plus plugins must be installed prior to this.

Note:
When activating the plugin, folders of existing galleries are NOT automatically created. This must be triggered in the settings via ‘Save & Enforce Update of Folders’.
sections.installation:
1. Ensure the dependent plugins “MaxGalleria” and “Media Library Plus” are installed and activated
  2. Download and activate the “Folders for MaxGalleria” plugin
  3. Optionally adapt its settings via “MaxGalleria” -> “Folders Plugin”
  4. Save and enforce an update of the folders via settings. This will create the gallery folders.
sections.changelog:
0.2.0

Improved stability and compatibility when calling Media Library Plus functions and fixed issues with root gallery folder

0.1.2

Use YYYY/MMDD_gallery-name format instead of YYWW_gallery-name and optionally accelerate moving

0.1.1

Optionally enforce update of gallery folders when saving the settings.

0.1.0

Initial version which provides manual and automatic moving of attachments to the gallery specific Media Library Folder.

short_description: Save images and videos of each MaxGalleria gallery in its individual folder
